name: 02 C - Quality Assessment of Sales Transaction Data - Part 3

nodes.name: Read CSV
nodes.description: It reads in CSV files and creates a DataFrame from it.
nodes.hint: Infer the schema when a new file is selected or the file content has changed

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: path
fields.title: Path
fields.description: Path of the file/directory

fields.name: separator
fields.title: Separator
fields.description: CSV Separator

fields.name: header
fields.title: Header
fields.description: Whether the file has a header row

fields.name: dropSpecialCharacterInColumnName
fields.title: Drop Special Character In ColumnName
fields.description: Whether to drop the Special Characters and Spaces in Column Name.

fields.name: mode
fields.title: Mode
fields.description: Mode for dealing with corrupt records during parsing.

fields.name: enforceSchema
fields.title: Enforce Schema
fields.description: If it is set to true, the specified or inferred schema will be forcibly applied to datasource files, and headers in CSV files will be ignored. If the option is set to false, the schema will be validated against all headers in CSV files in the case when the header option is set to true.

fields.name: addInputFileName
fields.title: Whether to Add Input File Name as Column in the Dataframe
fields.description: Add the new field:input_file_name

fields.name: encoding
fields.title: Encoding
fields.description: Decodes the CSV files by the given encoding type

fields.name: quote
fields.title: Quote
fields.description: Sets a single character used for escaping quoted values where the separator can be part of the value

fields.name: escape
fields.title: Escape
fields.description: Sets a single character used for escaping quotes inside an already quoted value.

fields.name: outputColNames
fields.title: Column Names for the CSV
fields.description: New Columns from CSV

fields.name: outputColTypes
fields.title: Column Types for the CSV
fields.description: Data Type of the Output Columns

fields.name: outputColFormats
fields.title: Column Formats for the CSV
fields.description: Format of the Output Columns

fields.name: extraOptionsKeys
fields.title: Properties Name
fields.description: Extra options/properites available while executing in Read CSV.

fields.name: extraOptionsValues
fields.title: Properties Value
fields.description: Config Values for the Corresponding properites name

nodes.name: SQL
nodes.description: This node runs the given SQL on the incoming DataFrame
nodes.hint: Whenever the table is changed, go to InferSchema tab and Infer the Schema

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: tempTable
fields.title: Temp Table
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value: SELECT *,COUNT(success) OVER(PARTITION BY expectation_type) as Counts FROM fire_temp_table
fields.title: SQL
fields.description: SQL to be run

fields.name: outputColNames
fields.title: Output Column Names
fields.description: Name of the Output Columns

fields.name: outputColTypes
fields.title: Output Column Types
fields.description: Data Type of the Output Columns

fields.name: outputColFormats
fields.title: Output Column Formats
fields.description: Format of the Output Columns

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: xSort
fields.title: X Axis Sorting order
fields.description: Choose sorting for X-axis if needed.

fields.name: maxValuesToDisplay
fields.title: Max Values To Display
fields.description: Maximum number of values to display in result.

fields.name: isStreaming
fields.title: Is Streaming?
fields.description: Whether the Graph is a Streaming Graph or not

fields.name: material
fields.title: Material Chart
fields.description: Select true will use material design

fields.name: percent
fields.title: Use percent
fields.description: Select true to present data in percent

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: groupingCols
fields.title: Grouping Columns
fields.description: Grouping Columns

fields.name: aggregateCols
fields.title: Aggregate Columns
fields.description: Aggregate Columns

fields.name: aggregateOperations
fields.title: Aggregate Operation
fields.description: Aggregate Operation

fields.name: outputColNames
fields.title: Output Column Names
fields.description: Output Column Names, default value is aggregateOperation_aggregateCol.

fields.name: whereClause
fields.title: Where Clause
fields.description: where condition before group by function

fields.name: havingClause
fields.title: Having Clause
fields.description: having condition after group by function

nodes.name: Row Filter
nodes.description: This node creates a new DataFrame containing the rows that satisfy the given condition

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: conditionExpr
fields.title: Conditional Expression
fields.description: The filtering condition. Rows not satisfying given condition will be excluded from output DataFrame. eg: usd_pledged_real > 0 and (category = 1 or category == 2) and goal > 100

nodes.name: Print N Rows
nodes.description: Prints the specified number of records in the DataFrame. It is useful for seeing intermediate output

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: title
fields.value: Expect Column Value Lengths to be Between
fields.title: Title

fields.name: n
fields.title: Num Rows to Print
fields.description: number of rows to be printed

fields.name: displayDataType
fields.title: Display Data Type
fields.description: If true display rows DataType
